lead_paragraph: Spain’s Supreme Court has ruled that nudism is not a fundamental right by backing a town’s decision to prohibit it and impose fines.

headline.print_headline: Spain: A Right to Bare Arms but Not Much More
headline.main: Spain: A Right to Bare Arms but Not Much More

snippet: Spain’s Supreme Court has ruled that nudism is not a fundamental right by backing a town’s decision to prohibit it and impose fines.
